name: Gunslingers
overview: Gunslingers is an action-packed rail-shooter for Wii. Taking unique advantage of the abilities of the Wii Remote to put the player in the middle of a gripping cowboy saga. With your shotgun or pistol in hand and your stagecoach speeding along, prepare to shoot fast and to shoot straight to beat the sinister Molina and survive. On top of a train, in a gold rush town, in the depth of a gold mine, in an Indian village, taking cover behind the saloon bar, alone or with friends, you only have one motto: I shoot, therefore I live! With inspired production, Western Heroes is an exciting, explosive and addictive rail-shooter, a genuine interactive western, accessible to living-room-cowboys of all ages!
